cboCostEstimates.description: As reported by the Senate Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs on August 4, 2022
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 91, an act to designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 810 South Pendleton Street in Easley, South Carolina, as the “Private First Class Barrett Lyle Austin Post Office Building

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 2 (Monday, January 4, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. DUNCAN:
H.R. 91.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 8, Clause 3
[Page H53]
title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 810 South Pendleton Street in Easley, South Carolina, as the "Private First Class Barrett Lyle Austin Post Office Building".
